availability.p: You are free to share and adapt the material under the following conditions: You must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. You may do so in any reasonable manner, but not in any way that suggests the licensor endorses you or your use. You may not use the material for commercial purposes. If you remix, transform, or build upon the material, you must distribute your contributions under the same license as the original.

revisionDesc.change: Created by XSL transformation from an EXMARaLDA basic transcription

annotationBlock.u: giṭʕat il-gmāš hāḏa ḥabībt-i kānu a yaʕni yāxḏūn giṭʕat il-gmāš hāḏa yifasslūn-ah, yilbisūn-ah, tamām? hū mū mfassal, bass yuwaddun ʕa-xayyāṭ, xayyāṭa, itfassl-ah kiḏa w-yilbisūn-ah. tamām? nafs hāḏa š-šāy
la, ʕala ḥasab, ʕala ḥasab, bass inno aġlab šāy, kiḏa hāḏa ḥabībt-i l-ḥinna illi yiǧi lōn-ah kiḏa, šūfi, šimmi rīḥt-ah, lōn, a rīḥt-ah ġarība šwayy.
ēywah, šāyfa yaʕǧunūn-ah f-mōya, tamām? baʕd-ma yaʕǧunūn-ah f-mōya, yxallūn-ah šwayy sāʕatēn ṯalāṯ saʕāt, baʕdēn yiḥuṭṭūn-ah f-íl-yadd yiḥuṭṭūn kiḏa baʕdēn tiṭlaʕ nafs ir-rasma, tamām?
fī ṣuwar b-in-nit, ana nšalla awarrī-k, tamām?hāḏi l-mubxara

ēy, ēywah hāḏi il-mubxara, baʕd min ṯaqafát-na l-ʕarabiyya ä, šāyfa? kiḏa itḥaṭṭīn hina ǧamra, taʕrifīn ǧamra? tmannēt law fī, ʕala šān awarrī-k, bass l-il-asaf ma fī, kiḏa ǧamra, baʕdēn yḥaṭṭūn al-baxūr w-yiṭlaʕ yaʕniʕindi baxūr, ana awarrī-k kam giṭʕa nšalla aʕṭī-k iyā-ha
yā Asma al-ä ḥagget hāḏa tgūl ma fī tgūl, tgūl biʕd sāʕa ba-aǧīb
inti šāyfa ḥabībt-i hāḏi min ṯaqafát-na l-ʕarabiyya ana marra tmannēt walla anni kint aʕrif, ʕala šān ataḥazz-lek ašyā afḏ̣al al-muhumm ḥabībt-i hāḏi l-ašyā inšalla tfīd-ik l-baḥṯ-ik
umm, a, mīn, umm Mḥammed? umm Mḥammed is-sūriyya tgūl
tömsikīn-ah kiḏa, tḥöṭṭīn-ah tḥuṭṭin-ah ib-mōya šwayy, mahu yaʕni txuḏ̣ḏ̣īn-ah waǧid lā txallīn hmās tömsikīn kiḏa ʕarifi tšūfīn
w-tfukkīn-ah l-ēn yaʕni šuff tḥiṭṭīn-ah biʕd nuṣṣ sāʕa tġasslīn-ah f-il-mā baʕdēn, tāxḏīn-lik duhū
krēm, aw zēt tḥuṭṭīn-ah ʕalē-h kiḏa txallīn-ah fatra biʕdēn xalāṣ ʕādi, xxx
lā lā lā, lā walla yāxuḏ sbūʕēn w-hu ma rāḥ, sbūʕēn hāḏa akṯar
ʕala l-aḏ̣āfir, hāḏa kəll-ha ḏ̣āfir hāḏa
lā lā ēy lā mu šarṭ
lā mahu ṯalāṯ saʕāt, nōb nuṣṣ sāʕa ʕala ḥasab ma tabīn sāʕa
ēy, fī nōb w-fī ha-ḥyān w-fī
marrāt, ʕala kill, lākin yaʕni, gadd illi tabí
nuṣṣ sāʕa, nuṣṣ sāʕa ḥuṭṭ-ah fī ʕašar dagāyig šufti ʕašar, tʕarfīn ʕašar dagāyig
bass inn-o yufaḏ̣ḏ̣al inn-ik ǧābīn-ah kiḏa ʕala rawāg, ʕala šān ä
xxx ma ʕānd-ik šuġl tḥuṭṭīn tḥuṭṭīn-ah ʕala š-šaʕr iḏa tḥibbīn iš-šaʕr,
ʕala š-šaʕr yixalli hunā yifri š-šaʕr xxx, ḥəlu ḥəlu
mufīd, mufīd l-farawt ir-rās ʕan ṣudāʕ, ʕan kull šāy
šufi ḥabībt-i, hū yiṭlaʕ lōn-ah zayy kiḏa, yiṭlaʕ kiḏa w-yiṭlaʕ baʕd awgāt nafs kiḏa, awgāt yingišūn kiḏa fi-h
lā, warrī-na nāgxe ṯāni haḏīk, haḏik ana b-yidd-i yiṣīr šāy kiḏa ana yibġa kiḏa fi-h nās kiḏa
umm-i yibġa-h kiḏa, fī nās, lā
lā, nōb nōb wa-lā ḥuṭṭ-ah hāy, ana ḥibb-ah aġlab il-wagt aḥuṭṭ, bass ana ha-l-ḥīna kinn-i ma ḥaṭṭēt
w-il-idēn fī-n-illi yigūl kəff, al-yad hāḏa, fī-n-illi yigūl kəff fī-n-illi yigūl yid-i
krāḥ yigūl-lah krāḥ ēy ir-rižl, hāḏ
mitʔakkida ma aḥad gāl-lik ha-š-šāy hāḏa krāʕ
yaʕni l-qadīm ma kān yigulū-lha krāʕ
baʕḏ̣ yigūl krāʕ, baʕḏ̣ yigūl xuff-iy ʕala kiḏa
ēy mašaḷḷa nnn wiš... kēf tgūlūn haḏōl
eḏin ēywah, mā-lha ayy musamma ṯāni
iḏnē-č hāḏi fī nās yigūlūn-ha, bass lahǧát-na l-farādsa ma ngūl iḏnē-č
iḏney, iḏn-i w-iḏn-i iḏn-i yaʕni f-il-iḏni tʕawwir-ni, iḏni fī-ha xurṣ
tʕarif il-ḥalag, illi kiḏa fī nās yigul-ūn-l-ah xurṣ
baʕḏ̣ hū yigūl xurṣ, iḏ-ḏihab hāḏa baʕḏ̣ hū yigūl xurṣ, baʕḏ̣ hū yigūl ḥalag
hāḏa, zayy hāḏa ʕaǧant-ah ḥaṭṭēt-ah fi-... ēy
yiṭlaʕ, fī nās yiṭlaʕ ʕala yid-hum aswad, fī nās yiṭlaʕ ʕala yad-hum a aḥmar
baʕḏ̣-hum, aḥmar, ana, aswad hāḏa ṭabīʕt-ah ʕala īd-i, šiftī-h, b-il-ʕīd, tʕarfīn b-il-ʕīd? hāḏi yid-i, tšūfīn
ēy mašaḷḷa ḥasab iš-šaxṣ yiṭlaʕ aḥmar,
awgāt yiṭlaʕ kiḏa in-nagš ma twaggaʕ inn-i ma dri wēn ṣūrat-ah
lāʔ awarrī-k bāʕd in-nagš, awarrē-š in-nagš
dawwri ʕa-n-nagš awarrī-ha n-nagš xxx aibʕat lēn aṣawwr-ih xxx???
hāḏi nagša b-munāsiba, hāḏi yid-i ana baʕd
šufti, tʕarifīn-an hāḏi yid-i tšuf tʕarfīn, aḥuṭṭ-ah hāḏā ʕaley, hōn hāḏi yid-i
w-yikūn ʕala l-kaff mu ʕala l-...
lā ʕādi, awgāt hēna, awgāt hēna awgāt hīla hēna awgāt ʕala ṭ-ṭūl
illi yibġā-h illi yibġā-h, ana ma ḥibb ʕala kiḏa ana ʕala kiḏa ma ḥibb, aḥibb kiḏa ʕa-šān yiṭlaʕ ma hu, ma huw hāḏi yad-i w-lli xxx hāḏa nagš, naggāša

hāḏa l-ḥinna ḥinna, ana ma ḥuṭṭ, ä, ma ḥuṭṭ ana hāna ma huṭṭ ad-dōd, lā ḥuṭṭ manākīr ana ma ḥuṭṭ dōd w-la ḥuṭṭ manākīr, ana ḥinna, ṭabīʕi zayy hāḏa hāḏa ḥinna-i ana, ʕaṭēt... hāḏa min illi ana astaxdim-ah aḥuṭṭ ʕala r-rās, aḥuṭṭ ʕala l-yadd hāḏa ṭabīʕi hāḏa ṭabīʕi, warag ṭabīʕi
w-... yaʕni, min mita tistaxdimī-h hāḏa, ṭūl ʕumr-ik?
min yōm inni... gidīm, astaxidm-ah, ha-ḥīn ḥamdilla ʕand-i b-il-mazraʕ a, šagra ēywah, šagra ʕind-i
w-ē... w-nxišš-ha, waddī-ha ʕa-ṭaḥḥanīn hnāk, ngal-ah ṭaḥan b-iṭḥān-ah xōna kiḏa xxx tḥuṭṭ ʕala l-yad, tḥuṭṭ ʕala r-rǧūl (t or n??) nḥuṭṭ ʕala r-rās, hāḏa ḥinnā-na, l-badu āywah
āywah ʕala r-rǧūl ʕala, ʕala ṭabīʕt-ah
ṭabīʕi hāḏa, li-r-rās zēn, l-il-yad zēn ṭabīʕa
